```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(olsrr)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
data <- read_table("A18-sjalv-win.dat",
                   col_names = c("län", "y1", "y2", "x51", "x41", "x52", "x42",
                                 "x11", "x12", "x61", "x62", "x21", "x22", "x3"))

data_1 <- data %>%
  select("län", "y1", "x51", "x41", "x11", "x61", "x21", "x3") %>%
  rename("län" = "län",
         "sjmo" = "y1",
         "arblös_män" = "x51",
         "arblös_tot" = "x41",
         "alko" = "x11",
         "urban" = "x61",
         "skilsmässo" = "x21",
         "religio" = "x3")

data_2 <- data %>%
  select("län", "y2", "x52", "x42", "x12", "x62", "x22", "x3") %>%
  rename("län" = "län",
         "sjmo" = "y2",
         "arblös_män" = "x52",
         "arblös_tot" = "x42",
         "alko" = "x12",
         "urban" = "x62",
         "skilsmässo" = "x22",
         "religio" = "x3")

save(data_1, file = "data_1.Rda")
save(data_2, file = "data_2.Rda")
```


```{r}
model_1 <- lm(sjmo ~ ., data = data_1 %>% select(!län))
model_2 <- lm(sjmo ~ ., data = data_2 %>% select(!län))
```

```{r}
all_1 <- ols_step_all_possible(model_1)
forward_1 <- ols_step_forward_p(model_1)
backward_1 <- ols_step_backward_p(model_1)
both_1 <- ols_step_both_p(model_1)
```

```{r}
test <- lm(sjmo ~ ., data = data_1 %>% select(sjmo, alko, arblös_män, religio))
```

```{r}
pairs(data_1[2:8])
```
